metadata.synopsis: The player has failed the wisdom save while wearing the mask - and fallen prey to the hag's control. Auntie Ethel takes over your mind.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Get out. GET OUT OF MY HEAD!
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Clutching head NodeContext: Panicked and afraid as the hag invades your mind. Lae'zel's line; Pa'vrylk = Stop! Pronounced; PAH-vrill-ck

1.text: Quiet, little one. Auntie will make it all better.
1.context: NodeContext: Soothing and cruel. A vicious insult as you take over their mind.
